title: Thu, 1 Jan
html:
DAILY DIVIDEND | Thu, 1 Jan

Happy New Year! US, EU & UK Markets Closed Today

ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ China Cracks Down on Beef Imports

China has slapped an *extra 55% tariff* on beef imports above new quotas from suppliers like Brazil, Australia and the U.S., starting Today (Jan 1st).

ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ U.S. Greenlights TSMC Chip Tool Exports to China

Washington approved an annual license allowing TSMC to ship U.S.-made chipmaking tools to its Nanjing plant, keeping operations smooth under 2026 export-control rules.

ğŸ”Stock Spotlight

Neuralink (NeuroTech): Eyeing Mass-Production of Brain Implants*

Elon Musk says Neuralink will begin high-volume production of brain-computer implants in 2026, pushing toward automated procedures and wider human use.

Netflix (Media): NFL Streams Hit Records

Netflixâ€™s Christmas Day NFL games smashed U.S. streaming records. Lionsâ€“Vikings averaged ~27.5M viewers, the largest NFL stream ever.

ğŸ“˜Term of the Day: Safeguard Tariff

A temporary tariff imposed when imports surge so sharply that they threaten domestic industries: often steep, quota-based, and designed to cool trade fast.
